title: Official Discussion: The Greatest Showman [SPOILERS]
selftext:
#Poll

**If you've seen the film, please rate it [at this poll.](https://youpoll.me/3778/)**

**If you haven't seen the film but would like to see the result of the poll [click here.](https://youpoll.me/3778/r)**

--------- 

#Rankings

**[Click here](https://youpoll.me/list/2/) to see rankings for 2017 films**

**[Click here](https://youpoll.me/list/4/) to see rankings for every poll done**

---------


**Summary:** 

American showman P. T. Barnum becomes the founder of the circus that will become the famous traveling Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus.


**Director:** 	
Michael Gracey

**Writers:** 	

*screenplay by* Jenny Bicks, Bill Condon

*story by* Jenny Bicks	

**Cast:** 

* Hugh Jackman as P. T. Barnum
* Ellis Rubin as Young P. T. Barnum
* Ziv Zaifman as Young P. T. Barnum's singing voice
* Michelle Williams as Charity Barnum
* Skylar Dunn as Young Charity
* Austyn Johnson as Caroline Barnum
* Cameron Seely as Helen Barnum
* Zac Efron as Phillip Carlyle
* Rebecca Ferguson as Jenny Lind
* Loren Allred as Jenny Lindâ€™s singing voice
* Zendaya as Anne Wheeler
* Yahya Abdul-Mateen II as W. D. Wheeler
* Daniel Everidge as The Lord of Leeds
* Keala Settle as Lettie Lutz "The Bearded Lady"
* Sam Humphrey as Charles Stratton "General Tom Thumb"
* Shannon Holtzapffel as Prince Constantine "The Tattooed Man"
* Paul Sparks as James Gordon Bennett
* Gayle Rankin as Queen Victoria


**Rotten Tomatoes:** [48%](https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/the_greatest_showman_2017) 

**Metacritic:** [48/100](http://www.metacritic.com/movie/the-greatest-showman)

**After Credits Scene?** No

title: Official Discussion: Cargo (2018) [SPOILERS]
selftext:
#Poll

**If you've seen the film, please rate it [at this poll.](https://youpoll.me/5047/)**

**If you haven't seen the film but would like to see the result of the poll [click here.](https://youpoll.me/5047/r)**

--------- 

#Rankings

**[Click here](https://youpoll.me/list/9/) to see rankings for 2018 films**

**[Click here](https://youpoll.me/list/4/) to see rankings for every poll done**

**Summary:** 


Stranded in rural Australia in the aftermath of a violent pandemic, an infected father desperately seeks a new home for his infant child, and a means to protect her from his own changing nature.



**Directors:** 

Ben Howling, Yolanda Ramke

**Writer:** 

*written by* Yolanda Ramke

**Cast:** 

* Martin Freeman as Andy Rose
* Anthony Hayes as Vic Carter
* Caren Pistorius as Lorraine Cassidy
* David Gulpilil as Daku
* Susie Porter as Kay Caine
* Kris McQuade as Etta
* Bruce R. Carter as Willie
* Natasha Wanganeen as Josie
* Simone Landers as Thoomi


**Rotten Tomatoes:** [86%](https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/cargo_2018)

**Metacritic:** [68/100](http://www.metacritic.com/movie/cargo-2018)

**After Credits Scene?** No

**VOD:** [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/80161216)
